participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and passionate about fitness, Jake is a natural leader and enjoys helping others.
participant_1.background: i'm a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i like to workout a a times a week. i enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and a bit quirky, Emily has a strong opinion on food and enjoys the nightlife.
participant_2.background: i do not like chicken. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.
